TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MsoPresetTextEffectShape extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定艺术字的形状。

span.span: Specifies shape of WordArt text.

span.para: 通过选择艺术字工具栏中的艺术字形状，可查看每个文本效果的形状的预览。
You can see a preview of each text effect shape by selecting WordArt Shape in the WordArt toolbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeArchDownCurve = int32(10)

summary.span: 文本是下凸弧。

span.span: Text is an arch that curves down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeArchDownPour = int32(14)

summary.span: 文本是下凸三维弧。

span.span: Text is a 3-D arch that curves down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeArchUpCurve = int32(9)

summary.span: 文本是上凸弧。

span.span: Text is an arch that curves up.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeArchUpPour = int32(13)

summary.span: 文本是上凸三维弧。

span.span: Text is a 3-D arch that curves up.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeButtonCurve = int32(12)

summary.span: 文本围绕一个中心“按钮”弯曲。

span.span: Text is curved around a center "button."

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeButtonPour = int32(16)

summary.span: 文本是三维文本，围绕一个中心“按钮”弯曲。

span.span: Text is seen in 3-D, curved around a center "button."

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeCanDown = int32(20)

summary.span: 文本伸展以填充形状的高度，只带有轻微下凸。

span.span: Text is stretched to fill the height of the shape, with only a slight curve down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeCanUp = int32(19)

summary.span: 文本伸展以填充形状的高度，只带有轻微上凸。

span.span: Text is stretched to fill the height of the shape, with only a slight curve up.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeCascadeDown = int32(40)

summary.span: 文本向上倾斜至右侧，同时字体减小。

span.span: Text slants up and to the right as font size decreases.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeCascadeUp = int32(39)

summary.span: 文本向下倾斜至右侧，同时字体增大。

span.span: Text slants down and to the right as font size increases.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeChevronDown = int32(6)

summary.span: 文本向上倾斜至中心点，然后向下倾斜。

span.span: Text slants up to its center point and then slants down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeChevronUp = int32(5)

summary.span: 文本向下倾斜至中心点，然后向上倾斜。

span.span: Text slants down to its center point and then slants up.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeCircleCurve = int32(11)

summary.span: 文本呈圆形，顺时针方向。

span.span: Text follows a circle, reading clockwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeCirclePour = int32(15)

summary.span: 文本具有三维效果且呈圆形，顺时针方向。

span.span: Text has a 3-D effect and follows a circle, reading clockwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeCurveDown = int32(18)

summary.span: 文本下凸，向右延伸时字体减小。

span.span: Text curves down and to the right as font size decreases.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeCurveUp = int32(17)

summary.span: 文本下凸，向右延伸时字体变大。

span.span: Text curves down and to the right as font size increases.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeDeflate = int32(26)

summary.span: 字体减小至文本的中点，然后增大至起始大小。

span.span: Font size decreases to the text's midpoint, then increases to the starting size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeDeflateBottom = int32(28)

summary.span: 字体减小至文本的中点，然后增大至起始大小，同时保持文本顶部在同一曲线上。

span.span: Font size decreases to the text's midpoint, then increases to the starting size, while keeping the top of the text along the same curve.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeDeflateInflate = int32(31)

summary.span: 字体增大至文本的中点，然后减小至起始大小。

span.span: Font size increases to the text's midpoint, then decreases to the starting size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeDeflateInflateDeflate = int32(32)

summary.span: 文本的字体减小、增大并再次减小。

span.span: Font size decreases, increases, and decreases again across the text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeDeflateTop = int32(30)

summary.span: 字体减小至文本的中点，然后增大至起始大小，同时保持文本底部在同一曲线上。

span.span: Font size decreases to the text's midpoint, then increases to the starting size, while keeping the bottom of the text along the same curve.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeDoubleWave1 = int32(23)

summary.span: 文本沿着一条线上凸、下凸、然后再次上凸和下凸。

span.span: Text follows a line that curves up, then down, then up and down again.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeDoubleWave2 = int32(24)

summary.span: 文本沿着一条线下凸、上凸、然后再次下凸和上凸。

span.span: Text follows a line that curves down, then up, then down and up again.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeFadeDown = int32(36)

summary.span: 文本顶部的显示位置比文本底部更靠近查看器。

span.span: Top of the text appears to be closer to the viewer than bottom of the text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeFadeLeft = int32(34)

summary.span: 文本左侧的显示位置比文本右侧更靠近查看器。

span.span: Left side of text appears to be closer to the viewer than right side.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeFadeRight = int32(33)

summary.span: 文本右侧的显示位置比文本左侧更靠近查看器。

span.span: Right side of text appears to be closer to the viewer than left side.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeFadeUp = int32(35)

summary.span: 文本底部的显示位置比文本顶部更靠近查看器。

span.span: Bottom of text appears to be closer to the viewer than top.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeInflate = int32(25)

summary.span: 文本的字体增大至其中点，然后减小。每个字母的中点不在一条直线上。

span.span: Font size of text increases to its center point, then decreases. Center point of each letter is on the same straight line.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeInflateBottom = int32(27)

summary.span: 文本的字体增大至其中点，然后减小。每个字母的中点在一条下凸弧上。

span.span: Font size of text increases to its center point, then decreases. Center point of each letter follows an arch that curves downward.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeInflateTop = int32(29)

summary.span: 文本的字体增大至其中点，然后减小。每个字母的中点在一条上凸弧上。

span.span: Font size of text increases to its center point, then decreases. Center point of each letter follows an arch that curves upward.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeMixed = int32(-2)

summary.span: 不使用。

span.span: Not used.

summary.span: 不应用形状。

span.span: No shape applied.

summary.span: 文本显示为写在三维圆环内部。

span.span: Text appears to be written on the inside of a 3-D ring.

summary.span: 文本显示为写在三维圆环外部。

span.span: Text appears to be written on the outside of a 3-D ring.

summary.span: 文本向下倾斜至右侧。

span.span: Text slants down and to the right.

summary.span: 文本向上倾斜至右侧。

span.span: Text slants up and to the right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeStop = int32(2)

summary.span: 文本构成停止标志的形状。

span.span: Text follows the shape of a stop sign.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeTriangleDown = int32(4)

summary.span: 文本向上倾斜，然后向下倾斜。

span.span: Text slants up, then down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeTriangleUp = int32(3)

summary.span: 文本向下倾斜，然后向上倾斜。

span.span: Text slants down, then up.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetTextEffectShape msoTextEffectShapeWave1 = int32(21)

summary.span: 文本沿波浪形向上，然后向下并再次向上。

span.span: Text follows a wave up, then down and up again.

summary.span: 文本沿波浪形向下，然后向上并再次向下。
